GENERAL_SUB_TITLE: Assign styles to the filter blocks.
FILTERS_SUB_TITLE: Runs a specific script selected from the script picker. This block produces values to be used as page parameters. This block consumes a page parameter by the key 'Account UUID'.
TITLE: title
USE_FIRST_VALUE_SUB_TITLE: When the value for this filter is not set, it will use the first option as default.
HIDE_WHEN_NO_OPTIONS_SUB_TITLE: When the options source is empty, the filter will be hidden.
MSG_ERROR_GENERAL: Something went wrong, Please contact your administrator.
